name: Perso
description: Perso is an atmospheric puzzle game. Collecting relics within each level will slowly reveal what and where you are. You will be in control of at least five cubes, each with different abilities. Use them all to find your way.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 2.4GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
